com.netmera.mobile
Class NetmeraActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper

                  com.netmera.mobile.NetmeraActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class NetmeraActivity
extends android.app.Activity

This class must be extended from push notification activity of your application. Instead Activity, you must extend this class. Its purpose is to decrease your coding effort for Netmera Analytics service. You can override Activity life cycle methods from this class. If you want to extend a third party Activity, first extend this class and then link your activity from this class. You do not need to add NetmeraEvent.onStart(Activity) and NetmeraEvent.onStop(Activity). They are already added in this class.
